ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card +
<4> .45x Wide Angle Lens (58mm) + <5> 2x Telephoto Lens (58mm) + <6> Spare LP-E10 Battery for Canon +
<7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <9> Precision Design 57" Tripod + <10> PD Digital SLR Camera Case +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + .45x Wide Angle & 2x Telephoto Lenses + Battery + (2) Filters + Tripod + Accessory Kit
